headline: Gold tumbles further from high, Hilton raises 2025 profit outlook
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including gold prices (GC=F) continue to recede from their record highs and hotel operator Hilton Worldwide (HLT) getting a stock boost after raising its 2025 earnings outlook. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: 3 early themes emerging this Q3 earnings season
summary: B. Riley Wealth chief market strategist Art Hogan joins Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the beginning of the third quarter earnings cycle, Big Tech earnings growth compared to that of the S&P 500's (^GSPC) other 493 companies, and how to play underperforming sectors. Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré also joins the discussion to look at Hilton's (HLT) quarterly results and explain what they indicate about the state of the consumer. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Earnings season, Netflix slides, Tesla Q3 preview: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are mixed in Wednesday's premarket as earnings season moves into full swing. Meanwhile, gold (GC=F) continues to pull back from record highs while silver prices (SI=F) see a boost. Netflix (NFLX) stock declines after missing third quarter earnings and revenue estimates. All eyes will be on Tesla (TSLA) today with the EV developer set to release its latest earnings results after the closing bell. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Hilton’s (NYSE:HLT) Q3: Beats On Revenue
summary: Hotel company Hilton (NYSE:HLT) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 8.8% year on year to $3.12 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.11 per share was 3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
